attributes.action: John's law To regulate finger print scanners and keep the data accurate and safe
attributes.additional_details: John frequently struggled to use the scanners at his work place to exit his place of work. In an emergency he could find him self trapped. More regulations are need for multiple reasons.
attributes.background: John was subject to massive abuse because of a companys ability to record accurately and safely his prints. Libelous only covers false statements. The poor recording and publishing of finger prints should also be coverd as defamatory since they can be mistaken for some one else. And ruin a character

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
